Key Match Events: Angola came back from behind to hold Algeria to a 1-1 draw.
Baghdad Bounedjah's goal in the 24th minute was ruled out due to offside position.
Nabil Bentaleb scored the equalizer for Angola from a penalty in the 65th minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Riyad Mahrez had a night to forget as he was heavily marked by the Angolan defender and could hardly breach their defence.
The entire Angolan team did a fantastic job in keeping the superior Algerians at bay.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Algeria dominated proceedings right from the word go.
The Palancas Negras finally had their moment in the 65th minute when Nabil Bentaleb brought down Mabululu inside the box.
Others: Algeria vs Angola was the AFCON opener for both teams.
Mahrez and Co. will aim to bounce back in their second group game on January 20 when they take on Burkina Faso.
